entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, DIMINISHING TO AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 60
SOUTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
BREEZY WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
